title: Silk Road Wallets Allegedly Connected to Ross Ulbricht Move Millions in Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Wallets labeled with connections to defunct dark web marketplace Silk Road moved millions in Bitcoin for the first time in years.

title: The Protocol: Stripe’s Tempo Testnet Goes Live
contentSnippet: Also: ZKSync Lite to Sunset, Blockstream App Update, Axelar’s AgentFlux

title: Stellar Edges Higher to $0.251 Despite Altcoin Market Apathy
contentSnippet: Trading volume surged 19% above weekly averages as XLM consolidated around critical $0.25 support level.

title: Hedera Rises 1.8% to $0.1372 as Government Adoption Momentum Builds
contentSnippet: Technical consolidation occurs alongside renewed focus on enterprise tokenization initiatives.

title: Surf Raises $15M to Build AI Model Tailored to Crypto Research
contentSnippet: Pantera Capital led the round, with Coinbase Ventures and Digital Currency Group also participating.

title: ICP Extends Decline as Range Support Breaks, Testing New Lows Near $3.48
contentSnippet: Internet Computer slipped back into a declining pattern after early strength faded, with the slide pushing the token toward key December support levels.

title: Strategy says MSCI’s 50% bitcoin test risks index ‘whiplash’ and conflicts with US pro-innovation policy
contentSnippet: Strategy argues MSCI’s proposed crypto holding threshold would be impossible to apply consistently and would "stifle innovation."

title: How One Polymarket User Turned $3K into $125K With a Single Prediction
contentSnippet: American singer D4vd was the most Googled person this year after a girl was found dead in his car—and one Polymarket user profited from it.

title: Crypto AI ‘four times better’ than ChatGPT and Grok raises $15 million
contentSnippet: The startup named Surf says over 300,000 people are using the platform with more than a million search results.

title: GameStop Posted $9.4M Loss on Bitcoin Holdings in Q3
contentSnippet: The firm has not announced any new bitcoin purchases since May, when it bought 4,710 BTC.

title: Tether Rolls Out Privacy-Focused Health App as Expansion Into AI Accelerates
contentSnippet: The company behind the largest stablecoin, the $186 billion USDT, is increasingly venturing beyond crypto into sectors such as artificial intelligence and robotics.

title: Crypto Long & Short: Investors Are Hunting for Countercyclical Value in Privacy Coins
contentSnippet: In this week’s Crypto Long & Short Newsletter, Carter Feldman writes that the bear market makes this a prime moment for privacy coins, signaling growing user demand for true financial autonomy. Then,

title: Trump brothers’ American Bitcoin adds another $38 million of the cryptocurrency as total holdings rise to 4,783 BTC
contentSnippet: Eric Trump said the company has become one of the fastest-growing bitcoin accumulators since its Nasdaq listing three months ago.

title: Polychain and Variant-backed ‘neo-brokerage’ Cascade wants to open 24/7 perps trading for any asset class
contentSnippet: Cascade raised $15 million in seed funding in a round co-led by Polychain and Variant, with support from Coinbase Ventures.

title: Strategy Pushes Back on MSCI’s Digital Asset Exclusion Proposal
contentSnippet: Michael Saylor and team urged MSCI to maintain neutral index standards after a plan to exclude firms with significant digital asset holdings.

title: SpaceX’s $300M Bitcoin Stack Puts Crypto Inside the World’s Biggest Planned IPO
contentSnippet: The Elon Musk–run company is moving ahead with plans for an initial public offering that would seek to raise “significantly more than $30 billion.” Even relatively small balance-sheet allocations matt

title: Ethereum ETFs Hit Six-Week High as Investors Rotate Within Crypto
contentSnippet: Spot Ethereum ETF inflows hit a six-week high, with analysts citing a structural rotation by institutions broadening their crypto exposure.

title: Morning Minute: JPMorgan Says No Crypto Winter
contentSnippet: The macro forces at play will outweigh the recent sell-off drivers, according to the major bank.

title: Ark Invest’s Cathie Wood: Bitcoin’s Four-Year Cycle Will Be ‘Disrupted’
contentSnippet: The Ark Invest CEO believes that Bitcoin has now switched to being ‘a risk-on asset,’ in contrast to gold.

title: Superstate’s new Direct Issuance Programs let public companies raise capital using tokenized stock
contentSnippet: Superstate will support onchain Direct Issuance Programs, enabling public firms to raise capital via newly issued tokenized securities.

title: Judge Blocks Connecticut From Enforcing Gambling Laws Against Kalshi—for Now
contentSnippet: The temporary order prevents state enforcement while the court weighs the company’s request for a preliminary injunction.

title: Binance co-CEO Yi He’s WeChat account hacked to promote and profit from memecoin
contentSnippet: The hacker spent 19,479 USDT to buy 21.16 million of the tokens, making around $55,000 from the subsequent pump, according to Lookonchain.

title: Twenty One Capital Drops in NYSE Debut as Bitcoin Treasury Firms Face ‘Broader Re-Pricing’
contentSnippet: The debut underperformed its SPAC benchmark, as investors pull back from Bitcoin treasury plays in favor of clearer operating models.

title: Bitcoin ETFs turn positive with $152 million in inflows ahead of Fed rate decision, while traders stay defensive amid expected volatility: analysts
contentSnippet: Markets are focused on Powell's speech, as six of seven FOMC meetings this year were followed by bitcoin sell-offs, analysts said.

title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX moves another $95 million of its bitcoin stash amid reported 2026 IPO plans: Arkham
contentSnippet: The transaction marks the ninth such transfer this year, likely to consolidate custody and upgrade from legacy bitcoin addresses.

title: EU Opens Antitrust Probe Into Google's Use of Publisher, YouTube Content for AI
contentSnippet: Regulators are investigating whether the tech giant imposed unfair terms while locking rivals out of content that powers its own AI products.

title: US teachers union urges Senate to withdraw crypto market structure bill
contentSnippet: The AFT said the bill could expose working families to digital asset risks and set the stage for a future financial crisis.

title: Kalshi secures temporary relief on Connecticut enforcement as legal fight escalates
contentSnippet: A federal judge ordered Monday that Connecticut authorities should refrain from taking enforcement action against Kalshi for now.

title: Rep. Keith Self Moves to 'Fix the Bill' With CBDC Ban Before Key Hearing
contentSnippet: The amendment follows Republican outcry over broken commitments to ban central bank digital currencies in the defense bill.

title: Solana Liquidity Plummets to Bear Level Territory Amid $500M Liquidation Overhang
contentSnippet: On-chain data shows Solana's liquidity has contracted to bear-market levels, with $500M in long positions at risk if its price drops 5.5%.

title: NFT winter deepens: Monthly sales hit lowest point of the year
contentSnippet: NFT sales fell to $320 million in November — their lowest this year — with early December off to a weak start as top collections slide across the board.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.
